exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros m z t n. split. - intros [j [H1 H2]]. induction n. + simpl in H2. rewrite H2. exists j. auto. + simpl in H2. apply or_assoc in H2. destruct H2 as [H2|H2]. * apply IHn in H2. destruct H2 as [j' [H3 H4]]. exists j'. auto. * exists (S j). auto. - intros [j [H1 H2]]. revert dependent j. induction n. + simpl. intros j H1. inversion H1. auto. + simpl. intros j [H1|H1]. * left. apply IHn. exists j. auto. * right. exists j. auto.
